short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable screen sharing during your vmeet.express video conference offered by Express Virtual Meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to share your screen during a vmeet.express video conferencing call. 

To use it, simply:

1. Visit https://vmeet.express
2. Log in with your access code
3. Click Screenshare

Offered by: ExpressVirtualMeetings
